description:
***UPDATE: This course is completely updated as of June 2016***

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Have you ever wanted to know how to create an information product, but didn't know where to start?

Do you wonder how online marketers are making sales with digital products?

Would you be interested in creating an automated income online?

Would you like to learn step by step on how to create a product without the hassle of going through multiple search engines trying to piece information together?

Are you new and struggling to get your current information product to sell?

If you've answered yes to any of the questions above this course is for you.

Information Products for Beginners is a course that walks you step by step on how to create and market information products online.

In this course, you'll have access to video lectures and supplementary material that give you clear direction and action steps on how to get a product to market.

This course will take about hour to complete, but if you take action on the information right after each lecture before moving on the next-- it can take a bit longer.

You will be provided with options on how to create various forms of digital products online: guides, eBooks, video courses, and printables. I walk you step by step on how each one should be created, set up for sale, and marketed.

Take this course if you want step by step instructions to begin making an income online by creating your own digital products.

***30 Day Money Back Guarantee, You have nothing to lose!***

Always wishing you the best,

-Argena
title: Information Products For Beginners
